name: Infernal Storm
description:
In this game you play as an Anti-Air emplacement and your mission is to protect a town from incoming bombers. The game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete.

Mouse to aim and shoot

Left mouse button to fire the main cannon

Right mouse button to shoot the turrets

Q to buy turrets

W to upgrade turrets

E to repair turret

Music made by Mpjv

Intro Music : "Frestorm" by Sabaton
